title: Becoming Aware: How to Repattern Your Brain
description:
Becoming Aware: How to Repattern Your Brain and Revitalize Your Life by Lisa Garr

English | 2015 | ISBN: 1401947263 | 216 pages | EPUB | 1,6 MB

Lisa Garr wants you to stop going through the motions in life. She wants you to become aware. Her mission on her internationally syndicated radio program, The Aware ShowÃ¢â‚¬â€and now in her first bookÃ¢â‚¬â€is to inspire positive growth in all areas of life and bring conscious conversations into everyoneÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s living room.
LisaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s own story is remarkable. Several years ago, she suffered a traumatic brain injury during a freak biking accident that rendered her unable to speak or rely on her short-term memory. She not only used cutting-edge EEG techniques to heal, but also set out to live a different life than the one she was leading in her pre-accident days. Lisa used this experience as a wake-up call and decided to transform in every way possible, including marrying her true love and giving birth to their daughter.

Today, the woman who couldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t even say a few words is a radio and Internet sensation with a massively growing audience and multimedia platform. Now she brings the lessons she has learned from countless interviews with inspirational, spiritual, and new-thought leaders to the pages of this book. She discusses how sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s applied them to her own life, and explains how you can, too
